leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-虚拟筛选与对接生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 构象→对接→打分→再打分→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 对接引擎 + HPC/workflow + 平台

unit.unit_name: AI筛选：生成/主动学习/优先级

queries: [WEB] de novo drug design framework github
[WEB] reinforcement learning for drug discovery github

tools.name: Apo2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule generation via dynamic pocket-aware diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Apo2Mol is a structure-based molecule generation method that uses dynamic pocket-aware diffusion models to generate 3D molecules fitting specific protein pockets.

tools.name: GuacaMol
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: GuacaMol is a standard benchmarking framework for evaluating generative models in chemistry, providing a suite of tasks to assess the quality and diversity of generated molecules.

tools.name: GuacaMol Baselines
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline models for the GuacaMol benchmarking framework
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains implementations of various baseline generative models (e.g., SMILES LSTM, VAE) used for comparison within the GuacaMol benchmarking suite.

tools.name: FastJTNNpy3
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Python 3 implementation of Junction Tree VAE
tools.detailed_description: An optimized Python 3 version of the Junction Tree Variational Autoencoder (JT-VAE) for molecular graph generation, often used for discovering valid drug-like molecules.

tools.name: DeepMol
tools.one_line_profile: Machine and Deep Learning Framework for Computational Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: DeepMol is a comprehensive framework designed to simplify the application of machine learning and deep learning techniques to computational chemistry and drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: Bio-Diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a geometry-complete diffusion generative model (GCDM) for generating and optimizing 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: 3D-MCTS
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation with Monte Carlo Tree Search
tools.detailed_description: 3D-MCTS is a general method for structure-based molecule generation that utilizes Monte Carlo Tree Search to explore chemical space.

tools.name: MolGenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for real-world applicability of molecular generative models
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for benchmarking molecular generative models, focusing on their applicability in real-world scenarios ranging from de novo design to lead optimization.

tools.name: DrugEx
tools.one_line_profile: De Novo Drug Design with RNNs and Transformers
tools.detailed_description: DrugEx is a tool for de novo drug design that leverages exploration and exploitation strategies using RNNs and Transformers to generate novel drug candidates.

tools.name: KGDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-guided diffusion for target-aware molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: KGDiff is a framework for explainable target-aware molecule generation that incorporates knowledge guidance into the diffusion process.

tools.name: Rag2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval Augmented Generation for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: Rag2Mol applies Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques to the problem of structure-based drug design to generate molecules.

tools.name: TGM-DLM
tools.one_line_profile: Text-Guided Molecule Generation with Diffusion Language Model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a text-guided molecule generation approach using a diffusion language model, allowing for conditioning generation on textual descriptions.

tools.name: PGMG
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore-Guided Deep Learning for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: PGMG is a deep learning approach that uses pharmacophore guidance to generate bioactive molecules.

tools.name: DrugReflector
tools.one_line_profile: Compound ranking from gene expression signatures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting compound rankings based on gene expression signatures using ensemble neural network models.

tools.name: ClusterX
tools.one_line_profile: Deep clustering framework for virtual screening visual inspection
tools.detailed_description: ClusterX is a representation learning-based deep clustering framework designed to assist in the accurate visual inspection of virtual screening results.

tools.name: PETrans
tools.one_line_profile: De novo drug design with protein-specific encoding
tools.detailed_description: PETrans is a transfer learning-based method for de novo drug design that utilizes protein-specific encoding to generate targeted molecules.

tools.name: Multisite_Calcium
tools.one_line_profile: Multisite calcium ion model for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A multisite calcium ion model optimized for simulating calcium-protein interactions in molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: EDM
tools.one_line_profile: E(3) Equivariant Diffusion Model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the E(3) Equivariant Diffusion Model (EDM) for generating 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication for UMI-tagged sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for sequencing reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI), optimized for scalability.

tools.name: DiSCO
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion Schrödinger Bridge for molecular conformer optimization
tools.detailed_description: DiSCO utilizes a Diffusion Schrödinger Bridge for optimizing molecular conformers, aiding in 3D structure generation.

tools.name: FlowMol
tools.one_line_profile: Flow-matching model for de novo molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: FlowMol is a mixed continuous/categorical flow-matching model designed for de novo molecule generation.

tools.name: Drug_Design_Models
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of deep learning models for drug design
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing reimplementations of various prominent deep learning models for de novo drug design, including REINVENT, Mol-CycleGAN, and GCPN.

tools.name: GOMC
tools.one_line_profile: GPU Optimized Monte Carlo molecular simulation code
tools.detailed_description: GOMC (GPU Optimized Monte Carlo) is a parallel molecular simulation code designed for high-performance simulation of large molecular systems using Monte Carlo methods.

tools.name: JODO
tools.one_line_profile: Joint 2D & 3D diffusion models for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: JODO learns joint 2D and 3D diffusion models to achieve complete molecule generation, handling both topology and geometry.

tools.name: GT4SD Molecular Design
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI pipeline for target-based molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI pipeline for target-based molecular design, part of the Generative Toolkit for Scientific Discovery (GT4SD).

tools.name: qde
tools.one_line_profile: Differential equation solver using QUBO/Quantum Annealing
tools.detailed_description: A tool that solves systems of ordinary first-order nonlinear differential equations by reformulating them as QUBO problems for quantum annealers, with applications in molecular dynamics.

tools.name: DrugAI
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based molecule generation and classification
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the generation and classification of drug-like molecules using neural networks.

tools.name: MolFM
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant flow matching for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MolFM, an equivariant flow matching model with hybrid probability transport for generating 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: ACSConv
tools.one_line_profile: Library for converting 2D convolution models to 3D
tools.detailed_description: ACSConv allows for the conversion of pretrained 2D convolution models into 3D models, useful for analyzing volumetric data such as medical images or molecular grids.

tools.name: DrugGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Transformer-based GAN for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: DrugGEN utilizes Graph Transformer-based Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for target-specific de novo design of drug candidate molecules.

tools.name: MolRL-MGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning with GPT agents for drug design
tools.detailed_description: A framework for de novo drug design that employs reinforcement learning with multiple GPT agents to generate molecules.

tools.name: pref-opt-for-mols
tools.one_line_profile: Preference optimization for molecular language models
tools.detailed_description: Code supporting preference optimization techniques applied to molecular language models for improved molecule generation.

tools.name: DeepBioisostere
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for bioisosteric replacement optimization
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for performing bioisosteric replacements to optimize multiple properties of molecules.

tools.name: DeepVS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based docking virtual screening tool
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning approach to boost docking-based virtual screening by learning from protein-ligand complexes.

tools.name: KG4SL
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based synthetic lethality prediction using knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network model incorporating knowledge graphs to predict synthetic lethality for anti-cancer drug target discovery.

tools.name: GeometryOptimization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry optimization library for molecular simulation in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing geometry optimization algorithms specifically tailored for molecular simulations.

tools.name: MolVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for VAE-based molecule generation and translation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation and framework for molecule generation and translation using VAEs, including JTVAE and HierVAE models.

tools.name: DrugFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Flow-based model for multi-domain de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A generative model using normalizing flows for distribution learning in de novo drug design, capable of multi-domain optimization.

tools.name: REINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular de novo design using RNN and Reinforcement Learning
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of REINVENT, a tool for de novo molecular design using recurrent neural networks and reinforcement learning.

tools.name: CGCF-ConfGen
tools.one_line_profile: Neural generative dynamics for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating molecular conformations using continuous normalizing flows and energy-based modeling.

tools.name: ConfVAE
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end molecular conformation generation via bilevel programming
tools.detailed_description: A VAE-based framework for generating stable molecular conformations by optimizing a bilevel programming objective.

tools.name: GeoDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric diffusion model for molecular conformation generation
tools.detailed_description: A SE(3)-equivariant diffusion model for generating high-quality molecular conformations.

tools.name: GeoLDM
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric latent diffusion models for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A latent diffusion model operating in a geometric latent space for generating 3D molecular structures.

tools.name: GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A platform using graph neural networks for graph-based molecular generation and design.

tools.name: REINVENT4
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive AI molecular design platform
tools.detailed_description: The latest version of the REINVENT platform, supporting de novo design, scaffold hopping, linker design, and molecule optimization.

tools.name: Deep Molecular Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Seq2Seq models for molecular optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular optimization using Seq2Seq models with attention and Transformers to capture chemical intuition.

tools.name: SMILES-RNN
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based RNNs for de novo molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing RNNs for generating SMILES strings, optimized via reinforcement learning for de novo design.

tools.name: GenMol
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI model for creating novel molecules using SAFE representation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model utilizing masked discrete diffusion and fragment-based generation with SAFE molecular representation.

tools.name: RetMol
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-based framework for controllable molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A framework that combines retrieval mechanisms with generative models for controllable molecule generation.

tools.name: f-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule generation with fragment retrieval augmentation
tools.detailed_description: A model for generating molecules by augmenting the generation process with retrieved molecular fragments.

tools.name: FragGen
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-wise 3D structure-based molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating 3D molecular structures in a fragment-wise manner, ensuring reliable geometry.

tools.name: paccmann_chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical data handling and generative models for PaccMann
tools.detailed_description: A library providing generative models and chemical data utilities for the PaccMann drug sensitivity prediction and design ecosystem.

tools.name: paccmann_gp
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization for PaccMann latent spaces
tools.detailed_description: A module for performing Bayesian optimization with Gaussian processes on the latent spaces of VAEs within the PaccMann ecosystem.

tools.name: PLUMED2 Smart Input Generator
tools.one_line_profile: MCP-based assistant for generating PLUMED input files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to automatically generate and validate optimized PLUMED input files for molecular dynamics enhanced sampling.

tools.name: Prolint2
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and visualization of lipid-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: An optimized tool for analyzing and visualizing lipid-protein interactions from molecular dynamics simulation trajectories.

tools.name: SmartCADD
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source virtual screening platform
tools.detailed_description: A virtual screening platform combining deep learning, CADD, and quantum mechanics methodologies.

tools.name: PharmacoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-guided pharmacophore modeling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for pharmacophore modeling enabling ultra-large-scale virtual screening.

tools.name: PS-VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule generation by principal subgraph mining
tools.detailed_description: A VAE-based model for molecule generation that utilizes principal subgraph mining and assembling.

tools.name: LEADD
tools.one_line_profile: Lamarckian Evolutionary Algorithm for de novo Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: An evolutionary algorithm-based tool for de novo drug design, optimizing molecular structures.

tools.name: DrugEx
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for de novo drug design with multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: DrugEx is a deep learning toolkit designed for de novo drug design, employing Pareto-based multi-objective optimization to generate drug-like molecules with desired properties.

tools.name: MolTaut
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating favorable tautomeric states of drug-like molecules
tools.detailed_description: MolTaut is a specialized tool for the rapid generation of favorable tautomeric states of drug-like molecules in water, essential for accurate molecular modeling and docking.

tools.name: IRDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Interaction-based Retrieval-augmented Diffusion Models for 3D Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: IRDiff is a diffusion-based generative model that leverages interaction-based retrieval to generate protein-specific 3D molecules, improving the quality and binding affinity of generated ligands.

tools.name: ChemLactica
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-tuned Large Language Models for molecular optimization and SMILES processing
tools.detailed_description: ChemLactica involves fine-tuning Galactica and Gemma models to operate on SMILES strings, integrated into a molecular optimization algorithm for chemical space exploration.

tools.name: chemprop-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification for neural molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A specialized version of Chemprop focused on fast and scalable uncertainty quantification for neural molecular property prediction, enabling accelerated optimization and guided virtual screening.

tools.name: NExT-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Molecule Generation combining Diffusion and Language Modeling
tools.detailed_description: NExT-Mol is a generative framework that combines 3D diffusion models with 1D language modeling for effective 3D molecule generation, as presented at ICLR 2025.

tools.name: GraphINVENT2
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined graph-based molecular generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly package containing the core functionalities of GraphINVENT, a graph neural network framework for graph-based molecular generation and optimization.

tools.name: WHAM
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted Histogram Analysis Method for free energy profiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to construct free energy profiles from biased molecular simulation data using log-likelihood maximization and self-consistent iteration approaches.

tools.name: Mol-CycleGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for molecular optimization using CycleGAN
tools.detailed_description: Mol-CycleGAN is a generative model based on CycleGAN architecture designed for molecular optimization, enabling the transformation of molecules to improve specific properties.

tools.name: Symphony
tools.one_line_profile: Symmetry-Equivariant Point-Centered Spherical Harmonics for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: Symphony is a generative model for 3D molecules that utilizes symmetry-equivariant point-centered spherical harmonics to generate molecular structures.

tools.name: dragonfly_gen
tools.one_line_profile: De novo drug design with deep interactome learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo drug design that leverages deep interactome learning to generate molecules with high predicted binding affinity to targets.

tools.name: HPCCS
tools.one_line_profile: High performance calculation of Collision Cross Section (CCS) for molecular ions
tools.detailed_description: A software for fast and accurate calculation of Collision Cross Section (CCS) for molecular ions based on the Trajectory Method, optimized for high-performance computing.

tools.name: PotentialLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for fitting interatomic potentials and atomistic data optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool to optimize atomistic data and interatomic potential models within molecular dynamics workflows, facilitating machine learning potential development.

tools.name: MoleculeSDE
tools.one_line_profile: Group Symmetric Stochastic Differential Equation Model for Molecule Pretraining
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Group Symmetric Stochastic Differential Equation Model for multi-modal pretraining of molecules, enabling 2D/3D generative tasks.

tools.name: Drug Gym
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environments for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A set of reinforcement learning environments specifically designed for drug discovery tasks, allowing the training and evaluation of RL agents for molecular design.

tools.name: CReM-dock
tools.one_line_profile: Docking-guided generation of chemically reasonable molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool that combines the CReM generative model with molecular docking to generate chemically reasonable molecules that fit specific protein pockets.

tools.name: MolPAL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for accelerated high-throughput virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Pool Active Learning (MolPAL) is a software for accelerating virtual screening campaigns using active learning to iteratively select and score molecules.

tools.name: MiDi
tools.one_line_profile: Mixed Graph and 3D Denoising Diffusion for Molecule Generation
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model that jointly generates molecular graphs and 3D conformers, used for de novo drug design.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug discovery, materials science, and biology
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library that provides a high-quality, open-source toolchain for deep-learning in drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology.

tools.name: DeepChem GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based graphical user interface for DeepChem
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface that makes DeepChem's machine learning capabilities accessible via a web browser for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: MoleGuLAR
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule generation using Reinforcement Learning and Alternating Rewards
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning framework for de novo molecule generation that uses alternating rewards to optimize multiple properties.

tools.name: C5T5
tools.one_line_profile: Controllable Generation of Organic Molecules with Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A transformer-based model for the controllable generation of organic molecules, allowing for specific property constraints during generation.

tools.name: Auto-QChem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for DFT calculations of organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for managing, generating, and storing Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations for organic molecules.

tools.name: DeepFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for fragment-based ligand optimization
tools.detailed_description: A deep convolutional neural network that guides structure-based ligand optimization by predicting suitable molecular fragments to extend a ligand within a receptor pocket.

tools.name: ScaffoldGVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Autoencoder for Scaffold Generation and Hopping
tools.detailed_description: A Multi-View Graph Neural Network based Variational Autoencoder designed for molecular scaffold generation and scaffold hopping tasks.

tools.name: Reinforced Genetic Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based drug design using RL and Genetic Algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A tool for structure-based drug design that combines reinforcement learning with genetic algorithms to optimize molecular structures.

tools.name: GeneDisco
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for active learning in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating active learning algorithms for experimental design in drug discovery, providing datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: ConfOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Energy-inspired molecular conformation optimization model
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of Energy-Inspired Molecular Conformation Optimization, a method for generating stable molecular 3D structures.

tools.name: TargetDiff
tools.one_line_profile: 3D equivariant diffusion model for target-aware molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating 3D molecules conditioned on a protein target, utilizing equivariant diffusion processes for structure-based drug design.

tools.name: Guacamole (HammerLab)
tools.one_line_profile: Spark-based somatic variant calling framework
tools.detailed_description: A somatic variant caller for NGS data built on Apache Spark, supporting multi-sample calling and local assembly.

tools.name: Molecular Hypergraph Grammar
tools.one_line_profile: Grammar-based molecular optimization method
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Molecular Hypergraph Grammar (MHG) for molecular optimization, enabling the generation of valid molecular structures via grammar rules.

tools.name: GaudiMM
tools.one_line_profile: Modular multi-objective optimization platform for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A modular platform for molecular design that performs multi-objective optimization to explore chemical space and identify novel molecular candidates.

tools.name: GENTRL
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Tensorial Reinforcement Learning for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model using reinforcement learning for de novo drug design, capable of generating novel molecular structures with desired properties.

tools.name: ReLeaSE
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement Learning for Structure Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A deep reinforcement learning framework for de novo drug design, integrating generative models with predictive models to optimize molecular properties.

tools.name: MolEdit
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular editing via multimodal generative learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for molecular editing that uses multimodal and group-optimized generative learning to modify molecular structures while preserving desired properties.

tools.name: PyBerny
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure optimizer and geometry optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for molecular structure optimization, implementing the Berny algorithm for geometry optimization in computational chemistry.

tools.name: MSO
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective molecular optimization in continuous latent space
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of efficient multi-objective molecular optimization using continuous latent spaces, facilitating the discovery of molecules satisfying multiple constraints.

tools.name: DrugHIVE
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based drug design with hierarchical generative models
tools.detailed_description: A deep hierarchical generative model for structure-based drug design, enabling the generation of ligands that fit specific protein pockets.

tools.name: EvoMol
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary algorithm for molecular property optimization
tools.detailed_description: An evolutionary algorithm designed for the optimization of molecular properties, serving as a baseline or tool for de novo drug design.

tools.name: SQUID
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant shape-conditioned generation of 3D molecules
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating 3D molecules conditioned on shape information, utilizing equivariant networks for ligand-based drug design.

tools.name: Molecule Generator (Graph)
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective de novo drug design with conditional graph generation
tools.detailed_description: A conditional graph generative model for multi-objective de novo drug design, allowing for the generation of molecules with specific property constraints.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug-target interaction and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction (DTI) prediction, drug property prediction, Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI), and Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI).

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for molecular property prediction and design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package for molecular discovery designed with an sklearn-style interface. It supports property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: 3D-Generative-SBDD
tools.one_line_profile: 3D generative model for structure-based drug design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a 3D generative model designed for Structure-Based Drug Design (SBDD). It generates molecules within the context of a protein binding pocket.

tools.name: fragment-based-dgm
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for fragment-based molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Code for a deep generative model that generates molecules by assembling fragments, useful for de novo drug design.

tools.name: SVDD
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models with soft value-based decoding for bio-molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implements derivative-free guidance in diffusion models for controlled generation of DNA, RNA, proteins, and small molecules.

tools.name: LiGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative models of 3D grids for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model framework that works with 3D grids (atomic density grids) for structure-based drug discovery and ligand generation.

tools.name: molecule-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model of molecular graphs (MoLeR)
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of MoLeR, a graph-based generative model for molecules that supports scaffold-constrained generation, developed by Microsoft.

tools.name: RUSH
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold hopping with generative reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of RuSH for scaffold hopping using generative reinforcement learning. Includes ScaffoldFinder for 2D decoration identification and 3D shape-based scoring plugins.

tools.name: s4-for-de-novo-drug-design
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical language modeling with structured state space models
tools.detailed_description: Codebase applying Structured State Space Sequence Models (S4) to chemical language modeling for de novo drug design.

tools.name: traversing_chem_space
tools.one_line_profile: Active deep learning for low-data drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Implements active deep learning strategies for traversing chemical space to discover small molecules, specifically designed for low-data drug discovery scenarios.

tools.name: MOSES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for molecular generation models
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Sets (MOSES) is a benchmarking platform to evaluate and compare the performance of molecular generation models using standardized datasets and metrics.

tools.name: PIGNet2
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-ligand interaction prediction model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based protein-ligand interaction prediction model used for binding affinity scoring and virtual screening.

tools.name: diffusion-conformer
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based molecule conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating molecular conformers using diffusion models, aiding in 3D structure analysis and docking preparation.

tools.name: RL-GraphINVENT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based targeted molecular generation platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for graph-based targeted molecular generation using graph neural networks and reinforcement learning to optimize molecular properties.

tools.name: openff-bespokefit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated bespoke force field parameter generation
tools.detailed_description: Automated tools for generating bespoke SMIRNOFF format force field parameters for individual molecules, supporting molecular dynamics and docking simulations.

tools.name: Deep-Drug-Coder
tools.one_line_profile: Generative neural network for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow/Keras based generative neural network for de novo drug design, capable of generating novel molecular structures.

tools.name: MolDiff
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecule diffusion generation addressing atom-bond inconsistency
tools.detailed_description: A diffusion-based generative model for 3D molecules that specifically addresses the atom-bond inconsistency problem during generation.

tools.name: Pocket2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient molecular sampling based on 3D protein pockets
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based drug design tool that efficiently samples and generates molecules conditioned on 3D protein pocket structures.

tools.name: ED2Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Electron-density-informed de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo molecular design and optimization that utilizes electron density information to guide the generation process.

tools.name: funcmol
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based 3D molecule generation using neural fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing a score-based generative model for 3D molecule generation using neural fields, as presented at NeurIPS 2024.

tools.name: optking
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular geometry optimization program
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for molecular geometry optimization, typically used in quantum chemistry workflows to find equilibrium structures.

tools.name: pylewis
tools.one_line_profile: Lewis structure based Fermi-orbital descriptor generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating Fermi-orbital descriptors based on Lewis structures, useful in electronic structure theory and quantum chemistry.

tools.name: HierDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical diffusion model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a coarse-to-fine hierarchical diffusion model for generating 3D molecular structures, as presented at ICML 2023.

tools.name: restraintmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build restraints for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate position or distance restraints for Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations, usable as a script or PyMOL plugin.

tools.name: Solubility-Prediction-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular solubility prediction using Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementation for predicting molecular solubility, utilizing RDKit for feature extraction.

tools.name: LAMMPS-LMFF
tools.one_line_profile: Layered Materials Force Field expansion for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: An expansion of the LAMMPS potential function based on Tersoff and inter-layer potentials, optimized for layered materials like graphene and boron hexanitride.

tools.name: LegoGram
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized molecular grammars for molecule discovery
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing optimized molecular grammars to facilitate the discovery of new molecules.

tools.name: matbench-genmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking metrics for generative materials models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing metrics for benchmarking generative models in materials science, inspired by Guacamol and CDVAE.

tools.name: DeepFMPO
tools.one_line_profile: Deep RL for multiparameter optimization in drug design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of deep reinforcement learning for multiparameter optimization in de novo drug design.

tools.name: TransRot
tools.one_line_profile: Monte Carlo geometry optimization for molecular clusters
tools.detailed_description: Molecular modeling software for simulated annealing Monte Carlo geometry optimizations of atomic and molecular clusters.

tools.name: DeepLBVS
tools.one_line_profile: Ligand-based Virtual Screening using Deep Learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation for ligand-based virtual screening tasks in drug discovery.

tools.name: MUBDsyn
tools.one_line_profile: Bias control benchmark for virtual screening with Deep RL
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for the CBM paper focusing on deep reinforcement learning for better bias control in virtual screening benchmarks.

tools.name: tqchem
tools.one_line_profile: Library for molecular structure manipulation and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for efficient manipulation, conformer optimization, and handling of molecular structure data.

tools.name: gopt
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure optimization and reaction pathway determination
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for optimizing molecular structures and determining chemical reaction pathways.

tools.name: MolScribe
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Structure Recognition with Image-to-Graph Generation
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for molecular structure recognition that converts images of chemical structures into molecular graphs (SMILES/Molfile).

tools.name: LSTM_Chem
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Recurrent Networks for De Novo Drug Design
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Generative Recurrent Networks (LSTM-based) for de novo drug design and molecule generation.

tools.name: ChemGE
tools.one_line_profile: De Novo Molecule Generation using Grammatical Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A population-based de novo molecule generation tool using grammatical evolution techniques.

tools.name: LICO
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models for In-Context Molecular Optimization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of LICO, a method using Large Language Models for in-context molecular optimization.

tools.name: reinvent-gdb13
tools.one_line_profile: RNN for generating molecules from GDB-13
tools.detailed_description: A Recurrent Neural Network implementation trained on GDB-13 to generate SMILES strings for small molecules.

tools.name: reinvent-randomized
tools.one_line_profile: RNN using randomized SMILES for molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A Recurrent Neural Network model that utilizes randomized SMILES strings to improve molecule generation diversity.

tools.name: reinvent-scaffold-decorator
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES-based scaffold decoration tool
tools.detailed_description: An encoder-decoder architecture designed for molecular scaffold decoration, allowing the generation of molecules around a fixed core.

tools.name: HN-GFN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Molecular Optimization with GFlowNets
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Sample-efficient Multi-objective Molecular Optimization with GFlowNets (NeurIPS 2023).

tools.name: graph2graph
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal graph-to-graph translation model for molecular optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ICLR 2019 paper 'Learning Multimodal Graph-to-Graph Translation for Molecular Optimization'. It provides a junction tree variational autoencoder (JT-VAE) based approach for translating molecular graphs to optimize chemical properties.

tools.name: multiobj-rationale
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective molecule generation model using interpretable substructures
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ICML 2020 paper for generating molecules that satisfy multiple objectives simultaneously. It utilizes a rationale-based approach to assemble molecules from interpretable substructures, improving the success rate of multi-property optimization in drug discovery.

tools.name: FLAG
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based molecule generation model using structural motifs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ICLR 2023 paper 'Molecule Generation for Target Protein Binding with Structural Motifs'. FLAG is a 3D generative model designed for structure-based drug design (SBDD), capable of linker design and fragment growing by leveraging structural motifs.

tools.name: InteractionGraphNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep graph representation learning framework for protein-ligand interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for accurate protein-ligand interaction prediction and large-scale structure-based virtual screening. It models the interaction as a graph to predict binding affinity and screen potential drug candidates.

tools.name: Mol-Instructions
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomolecular instruction dataset for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset designed to improve the capability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in the biomolecular domain. It includes instructions for molecule generation, protein engineering, and other chemical/biological tasks, facilitating the training of domain-specific AI models.

tools.name: MolGen
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-agnostic molecular generation model with chemical feedback
tools.detailed_description: A molecular generation model based on the ICLR 2024 paper. It employs a pre-training and self-feedback mechanism to generate valid and chemically relevant molecules, aiming to be domain-agnostic and robust for various drug discovery tasks.
